Name: Plugin Finder
Author: Kezyma
Description: Plugin Finder allows you to browse a list of Mod Organizer plugins as well as both installing and uninstalling them. Keep your plugins organised and up to date all in one place!

ReleaseNotes: (1.1.0) Initial alpha. Demo version.
(1.1.1) Added basic support for Mod Organizer 2 v2.5.0
(1.1.2) Added support for plugin definitions without any versions specified.
(1.1.3) Added support for installing plugins in formats other than zip files.
(1.1.3) Resized window to support 3 lines of text in descriptions.
(1.1.4) Stopped displaying disabled buttons.
(1.1.4) Fix for installing not actually working.
(1.1.4) Fix for paging when total pages are reduced.
(1.1.4) Stopped search from being case sensitive.
(1.1.4) Replaced minus icon with trash icon.
(1.1.4) Fix for plugin finder getting moved to the back.
(1.1.5) Fix for broken search when there are no search results.
(1.1.6) Added alpha, beta and release candidate icons.
(1.1.6) Prevents uninstallation of Plugin Finder.
(1.1.7) Added a total downloads counter.
(1.1.8) Reordered plugin list by installations.
(1.1.8) Stopped Plugin Finder opening until it has loaded data, prevents it from seeming broken.
(1.1.8) Fixed bottom row of buttons getting cut off (for some themes).
(1.1.9) Fix for uninstall crashing if a file cannot be deleted.
(1.1.10) Added release notes as tooltips on version numbers.
